thread.title: Hamilton Schuyler Sisters Sing at Super Bowl 2017
thread.title_full: Hamilton Schuyler Sisters Sing at Super Bowl 2017

author: Alyssa Bailey
title: Hamilton Schuyler Sisters Sing at Super Bowl 2017
text:
The Schuyler Sisters Just Slayed at the Super Bowl 
Sisterhood! By Alyssa Bailey Feb 5, 2017 It's Super Bowl time, and to kick things off, Hamilton 's original Schuyler Sisters—Renée Elise Goldsberry, Jasmine Cephas Jones, and Phillipa Soo performed America the Beautiful , a cappella. They made one crucial lyric tweak: 'Hamilton' cast sings: "And crown thy good with brotherhood — and sisterhood — from sea to shining sea." https://t.co/eW8DmApvH2 #SB51 pic.twitter.com/v0Qk2WQ1x3 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 5, 2017 Can they come to every game? More from ELLE:
